sentences.cn: “呃，观众们，你们好，”他含混不清地说。

sentences.en: "Hello, is this Raymond Brown?"— 'Yeah. who's this.'
sentences.cn: “喂，是雷蒙德·布朗吗？”——“对，您是哪位？”

sentences.en: "Hello, Maria," he said, and she blushed again.
sentences.cn: “你好，玛丽亚，”他说，这让她脸上又泛起了红晕。
“你好，斯旺森。”他说话的时候并未显得惊讶。

sentences.en: "Hello," he said. "This is an unexpected pleasure."
A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，科恩接起电话。“喂？”

sentences.en: Hello Freddy, it's only me, Maxine.
sentences.cn: 你好，弗蕾迪！是我，玛克辛。

sentences.en: Hello John. What can we do for you?
sentences.cn: 喂，约翰!我们能帮你做点什么吗？

sentences.en: Hello, Dolph. Glad I caught you.
I answered the phone and this voice went, "Hello? Is that Alison?"
sentences.cn: 我拿起电话，就听到这个声音：“喂？是艾利森吗？”

sentences.en: Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.cn: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.en: The salesperson greeted me with a warm hello.
sentences.cn: 售货员热情地和我打招呼。

sentences.en: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.

trans.tran_cn: 哈喽，喂，你好，您好，表示问候，打招呼
trans.tran_en: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone
used as a greeting when you see or meet someone
